name: Cloudy Cat Brawl - Bowen Wang _ Project 2b
name_original: Cloudy Cat Brawl - Bowen Wang _ Project 2b
description:
Welcome to the Cloudy Cat Brawl!

Who can be the last cat to stay in the clouds?" Meow!"

Get a balloon to keep yourself afloat.

Also fly or throw fish bones to keep the other pesky cats off the clouds!

---

This is the assignment for Fall 2022 - Intro to Game Development Project 2 Part 2.

This is a local two-player game.

Control instructions:

  • WASD /↑↓←→  for move.
  • *You can move up and down, left and right in the floating state 
  • Press Q/N to toggle attack mode, Press E/M to Attack/Shoot

---

  • Black cat assets - Created on the basic of the Cat Sprites
  • Background Music - 8 Bit Surf & Boss Time by David Renda
  • Some Sound effects - intercepted from the original action game
  • Text font - Kenney Mini Square
  • All other assets are from my own.
